DHS Ranipet Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 40 Staff Nurse Pharmacist and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 19, 2025, 10:16 IST
 National Health Mission
 40 Jobs |  Posted On : 19-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 8,500 to 18,000




FOLLOW

The District Health Society Ranipet (DHS Ranipet) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 40 Staff Nurses, Lab Technicians, Pharmacists, Health Inspectors, and Multi-Purpose Hospital Workers. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Pharm, B.Sc Nursing, Diploma, 12th, GNM, 8th, and D.Pharm can grab this chance and apply for the DHS Ranipet Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interestd and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Tamil Nadu.

DHS Ranipet Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Staff Nurse	31	B.Sc Nursing, GNM
Lab Technician	05	12th
Pharmacist	01	B.Pharm, D.Pharm
Health Inspector	01	Diploma
Multi-Purpose Hospital Worker 	02	08th

Age Limit for the DHS Ranipet Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years
The Maximum Age Limit: 60 years.

Selection Process for the DHS Ranipet Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the DHS Ranipet Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 8,500 /- per month.
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 18,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the DHS Ranipet Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the DHS Ranipet Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Staff Nurse notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form along with the required documents to the address mentioned in the official notification.

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	18-08-2025
Last Date of Application	01-09-2025
Application form	Click Here
Official Notification	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
